title: Update hidden revealed button label to playful English

requirements.summary: Change the revealed hidden button label (shown after the “No” button cracks/falls) to playful English text while keeping the existing success/celebration behavior unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: When the user successfully clicks the dodging “No” button, the crack-and-fall animation still plays and the hidden button still appears underneath.
The revealed hidden button’s label is English (no non-English words) and retains a playful tone (emojis permitted).

Clicking the revealed hidden button triggers the exact same behavior as clicking the main “Yes” button (confetti overlay + floating hearts overlay + existing success screen with the existing success message).
The revealed hidden button is clickable on both desktop and mobile (no pointer-events/z-index issues), and remains within the visible proposal area.

file_operations.description: Update the revealed hidden button’s user-facing label text to playful English (emojis allowed), keeping all existing visuals/behavior intact (still uses the same onYes callback for the existing confetti + floating hearts + success screen flow). Use the existing shadcn-ui Button component as-is for consistent styling/interaction; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
